wikipedia_page.main: Edward Lawson Birnie (25 August 1878 in Sunderland – 21 December 1935) was a professional footballer and manager. He played for Sunderland Seaburn, Newcastle United, Crystal Palace, Chelsea and Tottenham Hotspur In his managerial career, he took on the reins at Southend United, staying in charge of the seaside club until his retirement in 1934.

response: *1878 – Ted Birnie, English footballer and manager (d. 1935)
*1935 – Ted Birnie, English footballer and manager (b. 1878)
